tool_description: Why use SMS as OTP? When can you use WhatsApp?
name: Whatsapp OTP
title: Whatsapp OTP

api_list.name: /up
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-otp.p.rapidapi.com/595000000/up"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-otp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-otp.p.rapidapi.com/{number}/up"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-otp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
